item.title: Java, Spring and Hibernate microservice seed
item.description: I am frequently doing posts about TDD and trying to facilitate code seeds with everything in place to work with TDD, for example here or here . This time I want to provide a step by step guide for a microservice that will work with Java, Spring, Hibernate and Postgres that will be TDD ready from localhost all the way up to production. The challenge here, is to set up a comfortable way to test when dealing with a database and Spring.

item.title: Angular tutorial extended
item.description: If you follow the Angular tutorial , you will start building the ‘Tour of Heroes’ App and learn the basics from Angular. I always struggle with front-end frameworks so I decided to do the tutorial as we are switching to Angular 5 on my current project. I really recommend to do the tutorial. Other than my usual struggle with Javascript, I have to say that TypeScript comes more natural and “logic” to me.
